subject: Baseball
Memorabilia and Souvenirs
Athletics and Sports
Collectors and Collections
lead_paragraph: Brandon Steiner has been a force in the sports memorabilia business since the early 1990s, and he is a key figure in the selling of Derek Jeter’s final season with the Yankees.
snippet: Brandon Steiner has been a force in the sports memorabilia business since the early 1990s, and he is a key figure in the selling of Derek Jeter’s final season with the Yankees.
